meanings.sent1: The umbrageous tree shielded us from the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The umbrageous forest was a cool refuge on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The umbrageous umbrella was a lifesaver during the sudden rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: Her hat cast an umbrageous shadow over her face, giving her a mysterious air.
meanings.sent5: The umbrageous canopy of leaves created a peaceful atmosphere in the garden.

meanings.sent1: She was feeling umbrageous after being left out of the group chat.
meanings.sent2: He became umbrageous when his suggestion was ignored in the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The umbrageous cat refused to come out from under the bed after being scolded.
meanings.sent4: His umbrageous reaction to criticism surprised his friends.
meanings.sent5: The umbrageous customer demanded to speak to the manager over a minor issue.
